description: incised carving goes all the way through in areas; 2 pairs of figures and one group of 3 scattered throughout landscape with pavilion near top; one man holds woman in lap and holds cup to her mouth with standing man behind with arms in air; 2 men sit near pavilion and hold scroll; 2 men collect water by stream near bottom; top and bottom open
marks: 2 characters inscribed in tree to left of pavilion
title: Figures in Landscape Drinking Wine and Composing Poetry
